sense.def:
Kadar je človekovo vedenje
off-hand
, ni prijazen in vljuden ter kaže malo zanimanja.

seg.quote: ...the off-hand contempt with which she treated most men.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
off-hand
, nam pri tem ni treba veliko razmišljati.

seg.quote: Off-hand, I can think of three examples.
